TextLibrary.Text: Flicker
Elistara
I have some news of the lost Dragons!
I have some news of the lost Dragons!
I have some news of the lost Dragons!
I have some news of the lost Dragons!
Really? What is it?
Really? What is it?
Really? What is it?
Really? What is it?
The cave where we encountered the Undead Dragon - I managed to sneak inside.
The cave where we encountered the Undead Dragon - I managed to sneak inside.
The cave where we encountered the Undead Dragon - I managed to sneak inside.
The cave where we encountered the Undead Dragon - I managed to sneak inside.
What were you doing in the Realms of Death by yourself?
What were you doing in the Realms of Death by yourself?
What were you doing in the Realms of Death by yourself?
What were you doing in the Realms of Death by yourself?
I've been flying out every day, gradually covering more and more ground, looking for any sign of them. I finally found it yesterday.
I've been flying out every day, gradually covering more and more ground, looking for any sign of them. I finally found it yesterday.
I've been flying out every day, gradually covering more and more ground, looking for any sign of them. I finally found it yesterday.
I've been flying out every day, gradually covering more and more ground, looking for any sign of them. I finally found it yesterday.
What did you see?
What did you see?
What did you see?
What did you see?
I saw fresh Dragon tracks going into that cave. I think the Dragons are being held captive inside.
I saw fresh Dragon tracks going into that cave. I think the Dragons are being held captive inside.
I saw fresh Dragon tracks going into that cave. I think the Dragons are being held captive inside.
I saw fresh Dragon tracks going into that cave. I think the Dragons are being held captive inside.
Then we should set out as soon as possible.
Then we should set out as soon as possible.
Then we should set out as soon as possible.
Then we should set out as soon as possible.
